meanings.sent1: The zygomatic bone is a key part of the face structure.
meanings.sent2: Her zygomatic features gave her a defined facial structure.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his zygomatic bone was the reason he had a great smile.
meanings.sent4: The zygomatic bone, like a sturdy frame, supports the face.
meanings.sent5: The zygomatic bone, delicate yet strong, shapes the face beautifully.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the cheekbone.
meanings.sent1: The zygomatic arch protects the cheekbone.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her zygomatic area to feel her cheekbone.
meanings.sent3: His zygomatic touch on her cheekbone made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: The zygomatic curve of her cheekbone was elegant.
meanings.sent5: The zygomatic structure of the cheekbone adds to facial symmetry.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the area of the face near the zygomatic bone.
meanings.sent1: The zygomatic region includes the area around the cheekbone.
meanings.sent2: She applied makeup to her zygomatic region to enhance her features.
meanings.sent3: His zygomatic touch near her cheekbone tickled her.
meanings.sent4: The zygomatic region, like a gentle slope, frames the face.
meanings.sent5: The zygomatic area, close to the cheekbone, defines facial contours.
